item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2022 Enabling the discovery of fast transients: A kilonova science module for the Fink broker, B. Biswas, E. E. O. Ishida, J. Peloton, A. Moller, M. V. Pruzhinskaya, R. S. de Souza, D. Muthukrishna GRANDMA Observations of ZTF/Fink Transients during Summer 2021, V. Aivazyan, M. Almualla, S. Antier, A. Baransky, K.
